Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardMenu
      • Options
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    public class Options
extends CardMenu
    A section of the menu that allows players to choose the number of bots and difficulty. It scales with screen size to keep everything operational.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class CardMenu

        cellIndex, cellSize, controller, offset, oldDir
